title: Curious Child
description: Earned by completing your first set of development-based challenges, taking your first steps into understanding human growth.

title: Growing Teen
description: Achieved by progressing further through the course, showing how knowledge evolves just like people do.

title: Mature Adult
description: Unlocked by mastering advanced concepts of development, demonstrating your deep understanding of change over time.

title: Growth Keeper
description: Awarded for completing all developmental psychology levels — a testament to your mastery of the human journey.

title: Motivated Trainee
description: Earned by finishing your first industrial psychology tasks and exploring what drives workplace success.

title: Growing Worker
description: Unlocked by consistently applying principles of motivation and collaboration in scenario-based questions.

title: Corporate Leader
description: Achieved by solving complex organizational psychology challenges that require leadership-level thinking.

title: Productivity Expert
description: Awarded for conquering all industrial psychology levels, mastering the science of people and performance.

title: Presence Novice
description: Earned by completing initial challenges focused on identifying mental health patterns and symptoms.

title: Healed Mind
description: Unlocked by navigating more complex cases, showing your growing skill in understanding resilience and recovery.

title: Cognitive Listener
description: Achieved by interpreting deeper psychological stories with precision and empathy.

title: Therapeutic Patience
description: Awarded for completing the entire abnormal psychology journey — mastering the art of healing and understanding.

title: Testing Novice
description: Earned by completing your first assessments and learning how tools reveal unseen aspects of the mind.

title: Scale Selector
description: Unlocked by demonstrating precision in selecting the right tools and interpreting their results.

title: Master Clinician
description: Achieved by analyzing complex data sets and drawing accurate psychological insights.

title: Assessment Practitioner
description: Awarded for finishing all assessment challenges, proving your skill in measurement and interpretation.

title: Emotional Explorer
description: Earned by answering introductory questions on how emotions shape thought and behavior.

title: Stage Mapper
description: Unlocked by completing tasks that explore development and change throughout the lifespan

title: Empathetic Practitioner
description: Achieved by demonstrating deep understanding of human stories and psychological complexity.

title: Foundation Scholar
description: Awarded for completing the general psychology world — mastering the essential foundations of the mind.

title: The Psychometrician
description: Earned by completing every world and conquering all challenges. This badge celebrates your dedication, mastery, and command of psychological science.

title: Stage Seeker
description: Earned by answering 25 development-related questions correctly in a row.

title: Lifespan Cartographer
description: Achieved by maintaining 50 flawless answers focused on human growth.

title: Growth Guardian
description: Awarded for a 75-answer streak without errors, demonstrating mastery of each developmental stage.

title: Time Weaver
description: Unlocked when you reach 100 correct answers in a row, connecting every stage of life into one complete story.

title: Motivation Spark
description: Earned by answering 25 workplace psychology questions without a mistake.

title: Workforce Strategist
description: Unlocked after a 50-question streak in organizational behavior and performance.

title: Behavior Engineer
description: Awarded for 75 perfect answers, showing deep understanding of workplace dynamics.

title: Performance Architect
description: Achieved by sustaining a 100-answer streak, designing success through flawless reasoning.

title: Symptom Seeker
description: Earned by correctly answering 25 abnormal psychology questions in a row.

title: Clinical Decoder
description: Unlocked after 50 perfect answers, demonstrating your diagnostic precision.

title: Mind Healer
description: Awarded for 75 consecutive correct answers, bringing clarity to complex cases.

title: Psychopathology Scholar
description: Achieved when you reach a 100-answer streak, mastering the science of mental disorders.

title: Scale Setter
description: Earned by answering 25 assessment-related questions correctly without error.

title: Data Interpreter
description: Unlocked after a 50-question streak, interpreting psychological data flawlessly.

title: Insight Weaver
description: Awarded for 75 correct answers in a row, translating results into deeper meaning.

title: Diagnostic Specialist
description: Achieved with a 100-answer streak, proving mastery in psychological evaluation.

title: Cognitive Spark
description: Earned by correctly answering 25 general psychology questions consecutively.

title: Behavior Sculptor
description: Unlocked after a 50-answer streak, shaping fundamental theories with precision.

title: Theory Shaper
description: Awarded for 75 flawless answers, weaving psychological principles together.

title: Mind Navigator
description: Achieved when you hit a 100-question streak, navigating the vast field of psychological science with ease.

title: Mind Ascendant
description: Earned by ranking 1st, a rare achievement for those whose mastery, insight, and precision surpass all others. You stand at the summit where few ever arrive.

title: Psyche Sage
description: Awarded to the 2nd place explorer, whose deep understanding guides others through the mind’s vast landscapes.

title: Insight Conqueror
description: Claimed by the 3rd rank, mastering complex topics and maintaining an unshakable streak of insight.

title: Mind Voyager
description: Granted to the 4th to 10th rankers, steadily pushing the boundaries of knowledge and discovery.
